content.title: Launch the App
content.body:
1. On your mobile device, after successful launch, the Volt MX JavaScript Debugger Configuration window appears.
    Click Cancel.
  2. The Login form appears in the default locale layout.
  3. Kill the application.
  4. Change the language of the device to Arabic (United Arab Emirates). For more information on how to do this in Android, refer the link here.
  5. Open the application RecipientsMobile
    The Login form now appears with Arabic values and the layout also has changed to left.
